name: Wasp
text: Small but Mighty - Response: After Wasp (or an event you play) defeats a minion or side scheme, deal 1 damage to the villain.

name: Nadia Van Dyne
text: G.I.R.L. - Action: Shuffle up to 2 cards with a printed [mental] resource from your discard pile into your deck. (Limit once per round.)
flavor: "G.I.R.L. is dedicated to finding brilliant women who will not only save the world, but change it."

name: Wasp
scheme_text: Threat you remove using your basic thwart power (THW) can be divided among schemes as you choose.
attack_text: Damage you deal using your basic attack power (ATK) can be divided among enemies as you choose.
flavor: "Aww, you're all so tiny and cute."

name: Ant-Man
text: While you are in Giant hero form, Ant-Man gains the Giant trait and gets +1 ATK. While you are in Tiny hero form, Ant-Man gains the Tiny trait and gets +1 THW.

name: Giant Help
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme (remove a total of 4 threat divided among schemes as you choose instead if you are in Giant hero form).

name: Pinpoint Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy. If you are in Tiny hero form, this attack deals 1 additional damage to that enemy and gains overkill.
flavor: "You're going to want to ice that in the morning." - Wasp

name: Rapid Growth
text: Hero Interrupt: When you use one of your hero's basic powers (THW, ATK, or DEF), change to your Giant hero form and get +2 to that power for this use.
flavor: "bet you didn't expect to see that." - Wasp

name: Wasp Sting
text: Hero Action (attack): If you are in Giant hero form, deal a total of 4 damage divided among enemies you choose. Hero Action (attack): If you are in Tiny hero form, deal 5 damage to an enemy.

name: Pym Particles
text: Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 2 damage from your hero if you are in Giant hero form or draw 1 card if you are in Tiny hero form.

name: Red Room Training
text: While you are in Giant hero form, you gain retaliate 1. While you are in Tiny hero form, your basic attacks gain piercing. (Discard any tough status cards from the target before dealing damage.)

name: Bio-Synthetic Wings
text:
Wasp gains the Aerial trait.
Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, if you are in Tiny hero form, exhaust Bio-Synthetic Wings â†’ prevent 1 of that damage.

name: Wasp's Helmet
text: While you are in Giant hero form, you get +1 THW. While you are in Tiny hero form, you get +1 ATK.

name: Thor
text: Response: After you play Thor from your hand, deal 2 damage to the villain (3 damage instead if you paid for this card using a [physical] resource).
flavor: "You wanna eat my hammer? Then by all means, take a big bite!"

name: Wasp
text:
Wasp gets +1 hit point for each pym counter on her.
Interrupt: When Wasp enters play, place 1 pym counter on her (to a maximum of 3) for each [energy] resource you overpaid for Wasp's cost.

name: Into the Fray
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 6 damage to a minion. For each point of excess damage dealt by this attack, remove 1 threat from the main scheme.

name: Surprise Attack
text: Hero Response (attack): After you change form, deal 3 damage to an enemy (4 damage instead if you paid for this card using [physical] resource).

name: Boot Camp
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
Each ally you control gets +1 ATK.
flavor: "YOU CALL THAT A PUSHUP! MY GRANDMOTHER DOES BETTER PUSHUPS!"

name: Lie in Wait
text:
Max 1 per player.
Hero Response (attack): After a minion engages you, discard Lie in Wait â†’ deal 3 damage to that minion.

name: Ironheart
text: Response: After you play Ironheart from your hand, draw 1 card.
flavor: "I'm totally going to be like Tony Stark! Except for that weird facial hair."

name: Spider-Man
text: Response: After you play Spider-Man from your hand, choose THW or ATK. Spider-Man gets +2 to the chosen power until the end of the phase.
flavor: "I'm needed. And just like that, none of the rest of it matters."

name: Swarm Tactics
text:
Team-Up (Ant-Man and Wasp). Max 1 per deck.
Hero Action: Change to your other hero form. Ready your hero.

name: The Power in All of Us
text:
Max 2 per deck.
Double the number of resources this card generates when paying for a Basic (gray) card.

name: Running Interference
text: Play only if your identity has the Avenger trait. Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from the main scheme. Remove X additional threat from the main scheme (to a maximum of 3), where X is equal to the villain's stage number.

name: All for One
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy and exhaust any number of Avenger characters you control. Deal 1 additional damage to that enemy for each character exhausted this way.

name: Perseverance
text: Hero Response: After you change form, give your hero a tough status card.
flavor: "You do know the front door is unlocked, right?" - Spider-Man

name: Athletic Conditioning
text: Hero Action: Discard 1 stun or confuse status card from your hero.
flavor: "Don't worry, the ringing in your ears will go away... eventually." - Nadia Van Dyne
